aliases.name: push
aliases.command: echo 'Please use platform-specific push commands: gittey:push:windows or gittey:push:mac'

aliases.name: push:windows
aliases.command: gittey check:windows && gittey commit && git push
aliases.description: Run tests, commit changes, and push to remote (Windows)

aliases.name: push:mac
aliases.command: gittey check:mac && gittey commit && git push
aliases.description: Run tests, commit changes, and push to remote (Mac)

aliases.name: check:windows
aliases.command: cls && powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force "WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests\TestResults" && powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force "CoverageReport" && dotnet test WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && reportgenerator -reports:"WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests\TestResults\**\coverage.cobertura.xml" -targetdir:"CoverageReport" -reporttypes:"TextSummary" -verbosity:Off && type "CoverageReport\Summary.txt"
aliases.description: Run tests and generate coverage report (Windows)

aliases.name: check:mac
aliases.command: clear && rm -rf WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests/TestResults CoverageReport && dotnet test WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && reportgenerator -reports:"WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests/TestResults/**/coverage.cobertura.xml" -targetdir:"CoverageReport" -reporttypes:"TextSummary" -verbosity:Off && cat CoverageReport/Summary.txt
aliases.description: Run tests and generate coverage report (Mac)

aliases.name: clean
aliases.command: git restore . && git clean -xfd && dotnet restore && dotnet build
aliases.description: Restore, clean untracked files, and rebuild the project
